"Types Of Weapons"

M416

Assault Rifle

UMP

Submachine Gun

AWM

Sniper Rifle

DP-28

Light Machine Gun

DBS

Shotgun

"Weapon Details"

An assault rifle is a lightweight, rapid-fire firearm designed for military use, capable of both automatic and semi-automatic firing.

A submachine gun is a compact, lightweight firearm designed for close-quarters combat, capable of fully automatic or burst fire.

A sniper rifle is a high-precision, long-range firearm designed for accurately targeting distant objectives, with a telescopic sight.

A light machine gun is a portable automatic firearm used by infantry for sustained, rapid fire.

A shotgun is a versatile firearm designed for close-range shooting, It fires a spread of multiple small pellets or a single slug.
